Articles.Content: Hello guys my friends call me Momo and i've been playing KSP for quite some time now (2013, 2015-present). My main objective in this forum is to learn advanced tricks and tips with my fellow kerbonauts (and hopefully help some too). Soooo please take care of me Ã¢Ëœâ€ Ã£â‚¬Å“Ã¯Â¼Ë†Ã£â€šÂÃ£â‚¬â€šÃ¢Ë†â€šÃ¯Â¼â€°

Have no fear, Momo, we're all very nice here. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

A great place to learn about advanced gameplay tricks and skills would probably have to be the [*Gameplay Questions and Tutorials*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials) forum, where members can learn from others and ask questions of their own. Also, if you're in the mood for tutorials, YouTube user [Scott Manley](https://www.youtube.com/user/szyzyg/featured) has some outstanding videos that cover a wide variety of spaceflight aspects.

I hope you enjoy it here!

Hello Momo, and welcome to the forums!

Don't we all want to be taken care of? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Advanced tricks and tips and learning are the very bread and butter of these forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy landings!

Thanks for the resources! I've been watching Scott Manley's vids mainly because of his interstellar series, so I really never had the chance to study his methods (i only watch for fun). Right now I just landed on Duna using an untested rover that flips over when it goes beyond 19 m/s lol.
Welcome aboard! I'm from Wyoming, myself- We're pretty diverse here!

> 
> Welcome aboard! I'm from Wyoming, myself- We're pretty diverse here!

Wyoming eh? I got family/went to college around the Cody/Powell area.

And there's only like...3 towns in Wyoming, so there's a good chance I ran into you at some point ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Yeah the diversity of KSP players is amazing. I can't even imagine what will happen when 1.0 will come out... I hope more people will come to like and play this game...

There is certainly no end to the amount of help people are willing to offer. Hopefully you find what you are looking for.

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
